729762f-c.text:
Tompkins Avenue, at School Road, showing road construction and the erection of a foot walk across the railroad tracks. The view is north along Tompkins Avenue, the tracks crossing the latter directly above School Road.

August 23, 1935
P. L. Sperr

(2)
The same, viewing along the east side of Tompkins Avenue. The 2-story house (right) is at the N.E. corner of
the two thoroughfares.

August 23, 1935
P. L. Sperr

(3)
Viewing north along the new and old (left) railroad tracks. Note Tompkins Avenue crossing the tracks from the right foreground to the left background of the picture.

August 23, 1935
P. L. Sperr
729762f-c.folder: Tompkins Avenue & School Road, Staten Island, NY

June 12, 1932
P. L. Sperr
